snippet: Given the leading contenders for other top jobs, President Obama’s inner circle will continue to be dominated by men well into his second term.
abstract: Pres Obama's inner circle will continue to be dominated by men well into his second term; his recent nominations for top jobs raise concerns that women are being underrepresented at highest level of government and will be passed over; male appointees under Obama outnumber female appointees at 11 of the 15 federal departments.

byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett, Derek Willis and Sarah Cohen contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Given the leading contenders for other top jobs, President Obama’s inner circle will continue to be dominated by men well into his second term.

headline.seo: Obama’s Remade Inner Circle Has an All-Male Look, So Far
headline.main: Obama’s Remade Inner Circle Has an All-Male Look, So Far
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Remade Inner Circle Has an All-Male Look, So Far
